task.summary: Default task
Added Card Swirl
Added relic transcended feather & nerfed skillfull dodge
Added new relic Red Phonoblaster and fixed transcended feather
New Relic Sorbet
New relic Pocket Dynamo & New card Antiquity
Dejankified Some powers and added new relic molten lipstick
New cards drift,spark and twitch
Added the final three cards
First set of balance patches
Second set of fixes and balance patches.
New Common Attack Riot
New Uncommon Attack Firework + Third set of rebalances
Added some VFX
Added some VFX for firework
added some punching vfx
New Card art for Strafe + Riot Nerf
New card frames and skillfull dodge art
new Card Art for risky Strike
New card Tension
New Card Heavy Blows
Fixes for translucent Feather and new Card Repell
Changed Aggression, Added Life Charm.
New Card Dazzle + Changes to several cards.
New Card Ravage.
New Card Castle
Some rebalances & Changes
New Cards supersonic & nihil, fixed acceleration
New Card Shove, Changes to life charm, New card art for Agression
Changes to Persistence
Did everything.
new Image for glyph of time, buffed rapid pulse
Several small fixes + Card art improvements
Replaced Shine with shooting stars
new art for a lot of cards
nire card art, replaced dual mirror cut with new card shake, Focus Stab is rare now.
Reworked Sparks
Reworked Swirl & Drift
Oops forgot that github existed xwx
Added Card tags. Added new Card Stella. Changed Aurora Form.
Fixed several bugs. Changed Garbage Cannon, nerfed Heavy Blows, Buffed Gust of Wind.
Added Cufflinks relic and added sounds to existing relics
Rebalanced Spontaneous Strike and Stella, new Card art for Firework, Ravage and Shake.
Reworked Twilight Tone, nerfed and added proper art for cutting edge, nerfed razor and rising pheonix, added preview card to Nihil.
Mew card Masquerade, added TossAction
Added new Pluck Action
Changed Castle, Spontaneous Strike, Thrill, Zero Hero
Fixed Zero Hero and Antiquity
Renamed Razor to Memento Mori
Fixed Supersonio, Risky Strike and Vintage. Added Trusty Overcoat and Embroided Handkerchief.
